articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Egyptian Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Egyptian Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Egypt led by Assistant Minister Hussein Haridy at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Egyptian Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Egyptian Delegation
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, today met and had a talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Egypt led by Assistant Minister Hussein Haridy.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Refutes Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Refutes Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Remarks
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, in an "address commemorating March 1", pulled up the DPRK over its nuclear weapons and missiles and made such foolish remarks as "peaceful co-existence and co-prosperity", "cooperation" and "unconditioned dialogue".
					 In this regard, a spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Monday refuting his remarks.
					
					 The traitor's unreasonable slandering over the DPRK's nuclear deterrent and missiles is treacherous remarks which can be made only by a foul servant following the U.S. nuclear war policy, and it is no more than a senseless grumble of a guy ignorant about how peace on the Korean Peninsula has been preserved, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 He has zealously patronized the U.S. nukes and missiles for aggression on the fellow countrymen while getting hell-bent on the war exercises against the DPRK by introducing them into south Korea. But, he has viciously slandered his fellow countrymen's treasured sword of justice which safeguards security and peace of the nation. Not content with such behavior, he went the lengths of terming the launch of an artificial satellite for peaceful purpose "launch of missile". Such vile traitor as him can be found in nowhere.
					
					 Worse still, this traitor called for "respect to the agreed points", "co-existence and co-prosperity", "dialogue" and the like though he reduced the inter-Korean agreements to a dead document, regarding the fellow countrymen as "enemy" and returning evil for good. This call is disgusting sophism and an intolerable mockery of the nation.
					
					His recent grumble is nothing but a replica of his watchwords "no nuke, opening and 3,000 dollars", a declaration on his anti-reunification stand seeking confrontation and war, and it revealed once again the group of traitors' stance for confrontation.
					
					 What "true", a favorite word of the traitor, meant was more clearly evidenced by his recent remarks.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, forsaken by the people in south Korea, dared defame the dignified people in the DPRK as "compatriots in the north". This is an unpardonable political provocation that infuriates them.
					
					 The people in the DPRK have long spitted at the traitor, getting disillusioned about him.
					
					 Inter-Korean relations have already gone beyond the limit line to be irrevocable.
					
					 Lee should refrain from resorting to such foolish tricks any longer and step down from power at an early date as demanded by the people in south Korea and all other Koreans.
					
					 It will be the only way for normalizing the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Plant Trees
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Plant Trees
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Working people and school youth and children of the DPRK are turning out in planting trees in spring on the occasion of the tree-planting day.
					 On Monday members of the women's union planted pine-nut trees, chestnut trees, ginkgo trees and various species of trees and flower shrubs in the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace and trade union members on Moran Hill, school youth and children on Munsu Hill and agricultural workers on Mt. Ryongak.
					
					 Senior Party and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions planted trees together with working people from all walks of life and school youth and children 
					
					 Trees were planted by the Ministry of Railways and in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong, North Hwanghae and other provinces and cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Joint Resolution of June 15 All-Korean Committee
articles.content:
Joint Resolution of June 15 All-Korean Committee
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The north side, south side and overseas side committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration (June 15 All-Korean Committee) made public a joint resolution for whipping up the atmosphere of struggle against Lee Myung Bak and outside forces on Sunday, the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The resolution said that the March First Popular Uprising was a nationwide anti-Japanese patriotic resistance to retake the country and the sovereignty of the Korean nation usurped by the Japanese imperialist aggressors. Through the uprising, the Korean nation strikingly demonstrated itself at home and abroad as a nation with the spirit of independence and indomitable will not to allow any encroachment upon its dignity and sovereignty while refusing to be reduced to a slave to outsiders, it added.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 We will firmly defend the national dignity and sovereignty by giving full play to the proud tradition of independence and the patriotic spirit and categorically reject any action of destroying the national reconciliation and unity and seeking confrontation and war.
					
					 We will further strengthen the June 15 All-Korean Committee, realize the great unity of patriotic forces of different strata for reunification and democracy at home and abroad and wage a vigorous struggle against Japan's hostile actions and militarist reinvasion moves.
					
					 The resolution called upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to dynamically advance along the road of independent reunification, indicated by the north-south joint declaration, in high spirits with firm confidence in victory and optimism.

articles.title: Statement of AINDF Spokesman Issued to Mark Anniversary of March First Uprising
articles.content:
Statement of AINDF Spokesman Issued to Mark Anniversary of March First Uprising
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front released a statement on Sunday, the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, according to Kuguk Jonson (Internet).
					 The statement said that through the uprising the Korean nation fully displayed the steadfast spirit of independence and sovereignty and indomitable will to reject outsiders' domination and plunder and carve out its own destiny by its own efforts and gave a telling blow to the Japanese imperialists' ferocious colonial rule.
					
					 60 odd years have passed since the defeat of Japan which inflicted eternally incurable pain and grudge upon the Korean nation, but Japan has not yet repented nor made reparations for its crime-woven past and, on the contrary, it is trying to repeat its blood-stained criminal history while embellishing its past colonial domination and aggression war, it pointed out.
					
					 It said: The Japanese reactionaries have persisted in their wild design to strengthen the military alliance for aggression, turn Japan into a military giant and realize overseas expansion with the backing of the U.S. They vie with each other in making reckless remarks to justify Japan's past aggression and are getting evermore pronounced in the scheme to gratify their ambition for reinvasion, taking advantage of pro-Japanese traitor Lee Myung Bak's seizure of power in south Korea to more undisguisedly reveal their design to grab Tok Islet.
					
					 Owing to the pro-Japanese treachery of Lee Myung Bak, the pro-Japanese elements are now swaggering about in south Korea and such abnormal practices are taking place as beautifying and lauding the past colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, the statement noted, adding: Those disgusting behaviors are further inciting the Japanese reactionaries' ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 Struggle is the only way for putting an end to the colonial history of 100 odd years stained with flunkeyism and treachery under the outsiders' domination and building in south Korea a genuine society where national dignity and independence are ensured, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The people from all walks of life should inherit the patriotic spirit and tradition of the March First Popular Uprising to intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S., the struggle to terminate the colonial domination and military presence of the U.S. imperialists who have inflicted unbearable misfortune and pain on the Korean nation for over 60 years after occupying south Korea in the wake of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They should also wage a vigorous massive struggle to decisively deal a crushing blow at the ambition of the Japanese reactionaries who are sharpening their sword of reinvasion, preoccupied by the wild design for "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere," and wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group which is committing treacherous crimes one after another, staking its fate on sycophancy toward the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Photo and Book Exhibition Held to Mark National Day and Liberation Day of Kuwait
articles.content:
Photo and Book Exhibition Held to Mark National Day and Liberation Day of Kuwait
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A photo and book exhibition took place at the Chollima Hall of Culture Monday on the occasion of the 48th national day and the 18th liberation day of the State of Kuwait.
					 Present there were Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Paek Yong Ho who is chairman of the DPRK-Kuwait Friendship Association, members of the association and working people in the city.
					
					 A speech was made by Paek Yong Ho at the exhibition and then a congratulatory letter to the Kuwaiti emir was adopted there.
					
					 The participants went round photos and books introducing the history and culture of Kuwait and the custom of its people.

articles.title: Greening and Gardening Campaign Gets Brisk
articles.content:
Greening and Gardening Campaign Gets Brisk
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Working people from all walks of life and school youth and children are turning out in tree-planting campaign as one on the occasion of the Tree-planting Day.
					President Kim Il Sung, together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine
						Kim Jong Suk, climbed Moran Hill on March 2, Juche 35 (1946) and unrolled a far-reaching plan to create forests.
					
					It marked the beginning of a new history of afforestation in the DPRK.
					
					Covered with trees are mountains and fields of the country from the foot of Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, to the military demarcation line and from the eastern coast to the western coast.
					
					Sapling fields have been arranged well in different parts of the country, which produce lots of saplings of good species every year to be transplanted in streets, villages, mountains and fields. As a result, the work of greening and gardening is being done on a high level.
					
					All the mountains in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province, have turned into "golden mountain" and "treasure mountain".
					
					Spectacular are the one thousand and hundreds of hectares of pine-nut tree forest and over 10,000 hectares of oak forest created in the mountains in the county including Yaksu-ri and Okpho-ri.
					
					The mountains are covered with larch, black walnut and wild pear trees, Korean pepper bush, Schizandra chinensis and other various kinds of trees and the valleys with wild grapes and tara vines.
					
					The mountains in Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province with over 100 hectares of pine-nut tree forests are a pride of the Songun era.
					
					The tree-planting campaign is being briskly undertaken everywhere in the country including Yonthan County in North Hwanghae Province, Thaethan County and Pyoksong County in South Hwanghae Province and Kangwon Province, changing the appearance of the country beyond recognition day by day.

articles.title: Vibrant Sports Village in Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Vibrant Sports Village in Mt. Paektu Area
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Athletes, working people and school youth and children from different parts of the country are conducting winter physical culture and sports activities in the well-furnished sports village in the Mt. Paektu area, a comprehensive winter sports centre.
					Its total floor space covers 248,000 square meters at the foot of Pegae Peak.
					
					The area around Pegae Peak some 1,600 meters above the sea level is endowed with favorable natural conditions as winter sports centre as it has low temperature, much snow and thick woodland. 
					
					 There is in the sports village an ice rink built in a unique form of architecture, a skiing contest ground, an ice hockey gymnasium. A distance skiing course, a skiing jump place, a highland skiing course along the slope from the top of Pegae Peak and a tourist skiing course for visitors and tourists were built in harmony with the grand landscape.
					
					 It is also furnished with a lodging billet for athletes, a juvenile sports school, skier's rest-room and other accessory buildings and cultural and welfare facilities and a 900-odd-meter chair-shape aerial cableway from the foot of Pegae Peak to the top of the mountain, which is capable of carrying hundreds of athletes, visitors and tourists per one hour.
					
					   Having every condition convenient for the sports activities and life of athletes, the village can fully ensure international winter sports contests.
					
					   Kim Thae Yong, secretary of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, said that such grandiose winter sports centre could be constructed amid the care of the government. He added:
					
					   Now athletes are engaged in training on the wide skating rink where various skating contests can be held and on the well-built skiing course.
					
					   The school youth and children and tourists are also training themselves, overcoming the section difficult to go through.
					
					 Recently the skiing event of the Paektusan cup sports contest took place there amid interests and expectation of sports experts and skating fans on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islet Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islet Slammed
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries observe what they call "day of Takeshima" as an "annual event" in a bid to invent an excuse for staging a comeback to Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Japan's undisguised moves to grab Tok Islet are a wanton encroachment upon the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation. The fact that Tok Islet is part of the inviolable territory of Korea had already been clearly proved by historical materials and on the basis of geographical and legal grounds and similar historical materials substantiating it have been discovered one after another recently.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have stepped up their moves to grab the islet while crying out for publishing "stamps on Takeshima." They went the lengths of letting reconnaissance planes of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" fly over the islet. They also made sure that a "drill for taking over Tok Islet" was staged in secret and Tok Islet was marked as "part of the Japanese territory" in their "white paper on defense" last year.
					
					 They made the DPRK the first target of Japan's overseas aggression as they considered it as a big hurdle in Japan's realization of its scenario for reinvasion of Asia. It is the calculation of the Japanese reactionaries that they cannot realize their ambition to reinvade Asia unless they occupy the DPRK which imposingly stands as an invincible socialist fortress and a gate to the Asian Continent. Proceeding from this ambition, Japan is watching for every chance of reinvasion while escalating its hostile policy toward the DPRK to this end. The above-said observation of "day of Takeshima" lays bare the Japanese reactionaries' preparations to stage a comeback to Korea.
					
					 They are contemplating deliberately sparking and escalating the dispute over the issue of Tok Islet and rendering the situation tense with an eye to reinvade the DPRK under this pretext. Their moves to grab the islet are a prelude to staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 The above-said moves of the Japanese reactionaries compel the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to harden their determination and will that they should settle accounts with Japan to the last. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop running amuck, clearly understanding that they are foolish to try to grab the islet.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" serves as precious ideological and moral pabulum as it helps the servicepersons and people of the DPRK always enshrine the faith in their hearts that Korean-style socialism is the best and the fixed will to defend and glorify it to the last.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), deals with important issues arising in defending the socialist cause including the issue of making socialism one's faith and morality, the issue of giving full play to the advantages of socialism by successfully building it and the issue of thoroughly applying the principle of collectivism in all fabrics of social life, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The work serves as a powerful treasured sword which helps firmly maintain the purity of the socialist idea by frustrating all reactionary ideological offensives of the imperialists, precious ideological and moral pabulum which helps the army and people of the DPRK grasp the advantages of Korean-style socialism as their faith and great guidelines for making sure that the principle of collectivism is thoroughly applied in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 The people in the DPRK have been educated in the socialist idea of Juche under the care of the great Party for several decades and keenly realized through their life experience that the ideology, culture and way of life in the DPRK are the best. No matter what cunning and sinister methods the imperialists may employ in the future, they can never deprive its servicepersons and people of the soul of socialism enshrined in their hearts.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has always shaped the line and all policies, placing the people's interests above everything and reflecting their requirements and wishes and consistently enforced social policies for the people even under the difficult conditions. The people in the DPRK more keenly feel the popular nature of Korean socialism and are increasingly grateful to its system as the days go by.
					
					 It is the greatest honor and pride of the DPRK that it has firmly preserved the true nature of socialism, the collectivist principle and lifestyle in the arduous struggle over the last more than decade. 
					
					 The people of the DPRK are now more thoroughly applying the collectivist principle in the revolution and construction, guided by the ideas and theories expounded in the work while waging a general offensive to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation with the torch of a new great revolutionary surge.

articles.title: Students in North and South Issue Joint Resolution
articles.content:
Students in North and South Issue Joint Resolution
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Student Committee and the action headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a joint resolution on Mar. 1 on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The uprising was an all-people struggle waged against the Japanese imperialists who wantonly trampled down upon the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation, the resolution said, and went on:
					
					 90 years have passed since the uprising but the Korean nation has not yet been freed from the threat of war by outside forces and anti-reunification forces and a stumbling block is lying in the way of national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. which occupied south Korea under the mask of "liberator" after the Japanese imperialists' defeat has pursued the policy of colonial enslavement though more than 60 years have passed since then and worked with blood-shot eyes to perpetuate its presence in south Korea to keep the Korean nation split forever.
					
					 Due to the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group, its lackeys, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is growing so tense that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" is contemplating staging large-scale war exercises aimed at invading the north under the present situation where the inter-Korean relations have reached the phase of collapse, further escalating the military tension. This glaringly reveals its true intention not to stand for the peace of the nation and the country's reunification. 
					
					 Warning that only self-destruction awaits those who turn their backs on the nation, backed by foreign forces, the resolution declared that the students in the north and the south would devote all their energies to the struggle to drive out the U.S. and its followers and reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: General Strike of Press Trade Union Goes On in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike of Press Trade Union Goes On in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The general strike of the south Korean Press Trade Union is going into gear, according to south Korea's KBS and MBC.
					 The union called a rally in Seoul on Saturday, charging that the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the capital are seeking to remain in office long by putting broadcasting service under their control by the "bill on media" to mislead public opinion.
					
					 The organization declared that it would stage an all-out strike from Monday, after holding a rally for vowing the strike in Seoul with the attendance of local union members.
					
					 At the end of the rally it held a candlelight cultural event.
					
					 Earlier, it conducted information activities for disclosing the unjustness of the above-said bill in Seoul on Friday.
					
					 The trade union of MBC declared that it would fight out to defend the public nature of media. It began a struggle to totally refuse the production of broadcasting programs from Friday.
					
					 Meanwhile, the trade union of CBS, too, declared an overall strike involving all its members except personnel needed and set out on the action and the trade union of KBS announced that it would conduct a poll on its general strike from Mar. 2.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Condemned for Wrongdoings in S. Korea
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Condemned for Wrongdoings in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea released a statement on Feb. 25, condemning the deeds conducted by puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak during his tenure of office.
					 The day when Lee came to power was a day of disgrace as it witnessed the emergence of the murderous dictatorial regime, the statement said, deploring that since then south Korea has turned been into a land of darkness where coercion and tyranny, murder and confrontation with compatriots hold sway.
					
					 It charged that the Lee regime reduced the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to total bankruptcy and has aggravated the tension of the Korean Peninsula through war exercises of various forms and confrontation moves against the DPRK.
					
					 As long as Lee remains in power, there will be only more serious killings and terrible results of dictatorship in this land, it said, calling upon all the people to more valiantly turn out in firm unity in the struggle to force the murderous dictatorial regime to step down.

articles.title: February Holiday Observed at DPRK Diplomatic Missions Abroad
articles.content:
February Holiday Observed at DPRK Diplomatic Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo exhibitions, film shows and friendly meetings were held at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Laos, Iran, Syria, Pakistan, Mongolia, Thailand, Malaysia, Bangladesh, Kuwait, Egypt, Uganda, Democratic Congo, Italy, Germany, the Czech Republic, Romania, France, Switzerland, Austria and Mexico and the DPRK permanent mission at the Secretariat of the United Nations and international organizations in Geneva in the period from Feb. 10 to 16 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen on the front walls of the venues of the functions were portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and placed before portraits were floral baskets sent by political parties, governments, ministries, organizations and institutions and figures from various circles of those countries.
					
					 Displayed there were works of the President and Kim Jong Il and photos showing their immortal Songun leadership exploits and pictures introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The Mongolian minister of Foreign Relations hoped that the Korean people would register bigger successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous powerful nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. The chairman of the Thailand-DPRK friendly parliamentary group noted that the Korean people are firmly united around Kim Jong Il as he has pursued a policy for the people.
					
					 An Iranian vice-minister of Foreign Affairs said that he would exert all his efforts for the development of the cooperative relations with the DPRK which stands together with his country on the common front of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy held that socialism in the DPRK is sure to triumph thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, saying that he has led the struggle of the Korean people for building a great prosperous powerful nation to victory.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that the Juche idea and the Songun politics are the life and soul of Korean style socialism, adding that his party would positively support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico expressed the belief that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would fling open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Art performances, a film show and photo exhibitions were arranged in Mexico, Peru and Guinea and Taekwon-Do contests in South Africa and Bulgaria between Feb. 11 and 14 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of events were photos showing the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Benigno Gonzales Villasana, chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, said that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a great auspicious event of national historic significance as it gave the greatest fortune to all the Korean people. And the speaker praised the undying feats performed by him in carrying forward and developing the revolutionary cause of Juche and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said that Korean socialism provided by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is highly developed and genuine socialism and it is the hope of humankind struggling to firmly defend and develop the socialist cause under the uplifted banner of Juche, oppose the imperialist domination and achieve genuine liberation and freedom.
					
					 Put on the stages of art performances were immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il," "Blue Sky over My Country" and other Korean songs and songs and dances of relevant countries.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was a Korean film introducing Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu in four seasons.

articles.title: DPRK's Preparations for Satellite Launch Supported in India
articles.content:
DPRK's Preparations for Satellite Launch Supported in India
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the All India Agricultural Workers' Union, the All-India Peasants' Union, the Indian Association of Lawyers, the Democratic Youth Federation of India and the All India Students Federation on Feb. 25 issued a joint statement in support of a statement issued by a spokesman for the Korean Committee of Space Technology in connection with the preparations for the launch of an experimental communications satellite.
					 We fully support the statement issued by a spokesman for the Korean Committee of Space Technology in connection with the preparations for the launch of a satellite and wish the DPRK success in the satellite launch, the statement said, strongly accusing the Lee Myung Bak ruling forces of challenging the DPRK and escalating the confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 We are confident that the Korean people's just cause of achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the prosperity of the nation will be certainly crowned with victory and send strong support and invariable solidarity to their struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige varias unidades de la ciudad de Manpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige varias unidades de la ciudad de Manpho
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno varias unidades de la ciudad de Manpho.
					  El estuvo primero en la Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos de Manpho.
					
					  Guiado por el funcionario directivo de la empresa, recorrio la sala de educacion con los materiales historicos de la revolucion.
					
					  Al ver los objetos y datos exhibidos en la sala, recordo con gran emocion la gloriosa trayectoria del desarrollo que recorrio esta empresa.
					
					  Dijo que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente  Kim Il Sung, esta fundicion fue convertida en la moderna base de produccion de metales no ferrosos y anadio que las inmortales hazanas de direccion del Presidente se transmitiran eternamente junto con la orgullosa historia de la empresa.
					
					  Durante su recorrido por la sala del control universal de la produccion y otros procesos productivos, se entero detalladamente del estado de reestructuracion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					  Al presenciar una colada que realizan los fundidores, se mostro muy satisfecho del alto nivel cultural que tiene esta empresa en la produccion y la vida.
					
					 Tras recorrer los procesos productivos reconstruidos magnificamente, aprecio altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fundicion y los miembros de la brigada de cientificos y tecnicos de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek poniendose muy contento de que ellos incrementaron de manera trascendental la produccion de metales no ferrosos y remodelaron la empresa a la altura del nuevo siglo al terminar en un corto tiempo la reconstruccion tecnologica de los procesos de fundicion en pleno acato a la idea del PTC de dar importancia a la ciencia.
					
					 Seguidamente, paso revista a los establecimientos del servicio de abastecimiento incluyendo el nuevamente construido comedor de la fabrica y el invernadero de legumbres averiguando los detalles de esta labor.
					
					  Reconocio repetidamente los exitos laborales de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fundicion destacando que ellos hicieron muchas cosas en unos anos en todos los dominios como la produccion, el servicio de abastecimiento y la creacion del ambiente higienico y cultural.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas que incumben a la empresa.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio la Fabrica de Neumaticos Amnokgang.
					
					  Despues de recorrer la sala de educacion con materiales historicos de la revolucion, visito varios lugares de la fabrica agitada por producir un gran auge revolucionario donde se entero del estado de produccion y estimulo a los obreros que se esfuerzan por el aumento productivo.
					
					  Al presenciar por mucho tiempo la produccion en cadena de los neumaticos de buena calidad de varios tipos en todos los talleres dotados perfectamente de modernos equipos, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los muy patrioticos obreros de la fabrica terminaron con exito la obra de ampliacion de la capacidad desplegando altamente el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz y normalizan en alto nivel la produccion.
					
					  En su reencuentro con el matrimonio de los obreros del taller de acabado Kim Song Dok y Han Kum Ok, con quienes se reunio en el taller hace 11 anos, califico de grande el patriotismo de ellos que durante varios decenios, dedicaron toda su inteligencia y pasion en aras de la prosperidad del pais partiendo de su infinita fidelidad al partido y la revolucion.
					
					  Presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					  Llegado a la Fabrica de Hilado de Manpho, el Dirigente recorrio los procesos productivos, el deposito de materias primas, el albergue de los obreros y otros lugares haciendo conocimiento del estado de produccion y de servicio de abastecimiento.
					
					  Aunque esta planta es una fabrica de industria local no grande con poca mano de obra, aporta no pocos beneficios al Estado y contribuye a la vida del pueblo mediante la introduccion activa de nuevas tecnologias y la administracion rentable, subrayo.
					
					  Continuo que las experiencias de esta fabrica que da grandes utilidades y las otras de industria local en todas partes del pais demuestran patentemente la justeza y la gran vitalidad de la orientacion de desarrollar paralelamente la industria central y la local, presentada hace mucho tiempo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Tras informarse de los datos sobre la noble conducta de la gerente de la fabrica Ju Pok Sun, sostuvo cordiales conversaciones con ella.
					
					  Aprecio altamente los meritos de Ju subrayando que ella, que aunque estaba muy atareada por encargarse de una fabrica, crio con afecto maternal a muchos ninos huerfanos en el periodo tan dificil cuando carecia lo todo, posee una personalidad verdaderamente excelente, la concepcion moral comunista y la obligacion moral revolucionaria con que dedico todo lo suyo pensando primero en la sociedad, el colectivo, el partido y la revolucion.
					
					 La epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) es la gran era que forma a innumerables hombres mas nobles, hermosos y castos en este mundo, senalo y agrego que es invencible el poderio de todos los militares y habitantes coreanos que encarnan fisiologicamente el ideal colectivista "!Uno para todos y todos para uno!"
					
					 Subrayo que los obreros de la fabrica deben cumplir perfectamente su tarea para contribuir a la construccion de una patria prospera e indico las tareas y remedios para este fin.
					
					  A continuacion, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito el Restaurante Manpho.
					
					  Al recorrer el exterior y el interior del restaurante construido majestuosa y elegantemente, se entero en detalles del estado de su gestion consultando la calidad de diversos platos.
					
					  Se quedo muy complacido de que los funcionarios  de la ciudad y los empleados del restaurante se dispusieron de magnificos equipos para la administracion dando pruebas de su espiritu de servir al pueblo y ofrecen a los ciudadanos los originales y sabrosos platos cocinados con materias locales.
					
					  Enumero las tareas que se presentan en la administracion del restaurante enfatizando que ningun trabajo es mas honorable y digno que servir al pueblo.
					
					  Ese dia, el Dirigente recorrio la ciudad de Manpho cerciorandose de los detalles de urbanizacion.
					
					  Se alegro mucho de que los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la ciudad de Manpho acondicionaron excelentemente no solo sus fabricas sino tambien esta urbe transformada como tierra hermosa del socialismo.
					
					  En todos los lugares de la provincia de Jagang se crean cada dia nuevos saltos e innovaciones y reina el impetu socialista, de modo que comenzo a verse el esplendido perfil de la gran potencia prospera socialista, dijo y continuo que esta realidad admirable sirve de faro estimulante para el pueblo coreano que marcha como torrente infrenable hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang, creadores del espiritu de Kanggye, seguiran creando prodigios relevantes en la produccion y la construccion y cumpliran asi el papel de vanguardia en la ofensiva final por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado por Pak To Chun, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, y Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Estudiantes de Norte y Sur de Corea publican resolucion conjunta
articles.content:
Estudiantes de Norte y Sur de Corea publican resolucion conjunta
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Comite de Estudiantes de Corea y la Direccion de Lucha del 17o periodo de la "Federacion de Consejos Generales de Estudiantes Universitarios del Sur de Corea" (FCGEUSC) publicaron el dia primero una resolucion conjunta de los estudiantes del Norte y el Sur con motivo del aniversario 90 del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.
					  El Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo devino la lucha de todo el pueblo contra los imperialistas japoneses que pisotearon despiadadamente la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion coreana, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Aunque transcurrieron los 90 anos desde el estallido de ese levantamiento, por culpa de las fuerzas foraneas y los opositores a la reunificacion, la nacion coreana no se ha liberado todavia de la amenaza de guerra y se colocaron graves escollos en el camino hacia la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  EE.UU., que ocupo el Sur de Corea disfrazado de "libertador" despues de la derrota de Japon en a Segunda Guerra Mundial, practica la politica de avasallamiento colonia durante mas de 60 anos y actua desesperadamente para la division eterna de la nacion coreana y la ocupacion perenne del territorio surcoreano.
					
					　Debido a EE.UU. y su satelite banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, la Peninsula Coreana corre ahora la crisis que puede generar una guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					 Bajo las actuales circunstancias en que las relaciones intercoreanas estan a punto de ruptura total y se agrava cada vez mas la tension militar, el "gobierno" de Lee trata de librar un macro-ejercicio de guerra contra el Norte revelando por si mismo que no desea la paz nacional y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 Habra solo el arruinamiento a los elementos que traicionan a la nacion bajo el abrigo de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  Los estudiantes del Norte y el Sur de Corea lucharan dedicando toda su pasion de la juventud por reunificar la patria entre los connacionales expulsando a EE.UU. y sus seguidores.

articles.title: FDNA publica declaracion por dia de levantamiento popular
articles.content:
FDNA publica declaracion por dia de levantamiento popular
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun el sitio web "Frente de Salvacion Nacional", el portavoz del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista hizo publica la vispera una declaracion en ocasion del 90o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.
					A traves de esta sublevacion popular, la nacion coreana manifesto sin reservas su firme espiritu soberano e independiente de forjar su destino con sus propias fuerzas rechazando la dominacion y el saqueo de las fuerzas extranjeras y su indoblegable temperamento y dio un duro golpe a la cruel dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones sobre Corea, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Hasta la fecha a mas de 60 anos desde la derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial de Japon que dejo a la nacion coreana las heridas nunca cicatrizables y el rencor, este pais isleno da tinte positivo a su dominacion colonial y  guerra de agresion  en el siglo pasado  y trata de repetir esta criminal historia ensangrentada en vez de pedir disculpas y hacer indemnizacion por el respecto.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses, que persiguen tenazmente el fortalecimiento de la agresiva alianza militar y la ambicion de convertir su pais en una potencia militar y expandirse a ultramar con el apoyo de EE.UU., no cesan de pronunciar los disparates que justifican la historia de agresion del pasado.
					
					Ademas, aprovechando la toma del poder del traidor projapones Lee Myung Bak en el Sur de Corea, actua mas desesperadamente que nunca para realizar su meta de agredir de nuevo a Corea exponiendo abiertamente la ambicion de usurpar la isla Tok.
					
					Debido a las maniobras vendepatrias projaponesas del traidor Lee, se dio una situacion anormal en el Sur de Corea en que las fuerzas projaponesas camuflan y elogian, como si hubiera llegado su tiempo, la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones y cometen otras locuras por el estilo que fomentan la ambicion de los reaccionarios japoneses de retomar el camino de agresion a Corea.
					
					La lucha es la unica via para construir en esta tierra un verdadero mundo digno e independiente de la nacion poniendo punto final a la historia colonial de mas de 100 anos, martirizada por las fuerzas extranjeras y manchada de las huellas de servilismo a grandes potencias y acciones vendepatrias.
					
					Al heredar el espiritu patriotico y la tradicion del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo ocurrido hace 90 anos, todos los habitantes de distintos estratos deben intensificar la lucha por la independencia antiyanqui por acabar con la dominacion colonial y la ocupacion militar del imperialismo norteamericano que impone a la nacion coreana insoportables desgracias y sufrimientos ocupando por mas de 60 anos el suelo surcoreano en sustitucion de los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, deben librar dinamicamente la lucha masiva por castigar severamente a los reaccionarios japoneses, que afilan el sable de reagresion cautivados todavia de la irrealizable ambicion de implantar la "esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia Oriental", y por aniquilar a la horda de Lee Myung Bak que abulta el expediente de sus crimenes antinacionales viviendo del servilismo a EE.UU. y Japon.

articles.title: Resolucion del comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
articles.content:
Resolucion del comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los Comites del Norte, el Sur y ultramar para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio (Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio) publicaron el dia primero la resolucion conjunta para elevar el ambiente contra Lee Myung Bak y las fuerzas extranjeras en ocasion del 90o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.
					  El documento senala que el Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo fue la resistencia antijaponesa de toda la nacion para rescatar el pais arrebatado por los agresores japoneses y establecer la soberania nacional y apunta que el Levantamiento demostro claramente al interior y exterior del pais que la nacion coreana es la nacion que no quiere vivir de esclavo de las fuerzas extranjeras sino tiene el indoblegable espiritu independiente de no perdonar ni un minimo atentado a la dignidad y la soberania nacionales.
					
					  Defenderemos cabalmente la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion al poner de pleno manifiesto la orgullosa tradicion de la independencia y el espiritu patriotico y nos opondremos a todos los actos que estorban la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y persiguen el  enfrentamiento y la guerra, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Fortaleceremos el comite conjunto nacional del 15 de Junio, realizaremos la gran unidad de las fuerzas patrioticas democraticas pro-reunificacion de distintos sectores en el interior y el exterior del pais y lucharemos con vigor contra las maniobras de hostilidad y de nueva agresion militarista de Japon contra la nacion coreana.
					
					  Todos nosotros del Norte, Sur y el ultramar debemos avanzar a pasos firmes por el camino de la reunificacion independiente indicado por la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, llenos de optimismo y firme conviccion en la victoria.
